txt.en: Defeated many Linduin fire-flies in Laerlad.
Linduin fire-flies can be found in Laerlad.\n\nYou should defeat Linduin fire-flies.
You have defeated many Linduin fire-flies in Laerlad, allowing the Woodmen to travel without constant threat. They will be grateful for your efforts.
Something has agitated the fire-flies of Laerlad, causing them to attack without warning. If Laerlad is to be made safe for the Woodmen of BlÃ³mgard, these creatures must be defeated.
Frenzied fire-flies attack those who wander through Laerlad.
